messages.content: ComfyUI-Prompt-Combinator is a set of nodes for ComfyUI that allows generating all possible combinations of prompts from several lists of strings.
What does the 'ðŸ”¢ Prompt Combinator' node do?
The 'ðŸ”¢ Prompt Combinator' node generates all possible combinations of prompts from several lists of strings.
What is the purpose of the 'ðŸ”¢ Prompt Combinator Merger' node?
The 'ðŸ”¢ Prompt Combinator Merger' node enables merging the output of two different 'ðŸ”¢ Prompt Combinator' nodes.
What does the 'ðŸ”¢ Prompt Combinator Export Gallery' node do?
The 'ðŸ”¢ Prompt Combinator Export Gallery' node generates an .html gallery to navigate the output of Prompt Combinator (prompts vs. images).
What is the function of the 'ðŸ”¢ Pick Random Prompt from Prompt Combinator' node?
The 'ðŸ”¢ Pick Random Prompt from Prompt Combinator' node picks a single random prompt from a Prompt Combinator output.
How can users identify the inputs used to craft the filename_prefix?
To identify the inputs used to craft the filename_prefix, users can prepend the prompts with ids, such as 'cat@a cat', 'dog@a dog', etc.
What license is ComfyUI-Prompt-Combinator released under?
ComfyUI-Prompt-Combinator is released under the Creative Commons License Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported (CC BY-NC-SA 3.0).
